name: Dark Fark Brown #2
description:
Dark Fark Brown includes all of my least favorite farker stuff. 

new:
Fixed minimum width issue that made word wrap not function correctly. 
Removed new to fark real estate waister, as well as the header for the main columns. 
Removed plug and extra ad stuff. 

old:
color make over: dark with brown links AKA 'me no longer a blind farker'
removes whitelist adblock request AKA "squirrel farker"
removes flashy link, under main link, referring to site that is linked to. AKA 'attribution farker'
removes right column and header branding, that you never click, AKA 'BS farker'

So long live my eyes, and down with the squirrels, attribution and BS.

Although arguably, all 'news' on fark is BS.
additional_info:
Like everyone else stylizing Fark, I have not yet figured out to make the links act the same way when logged in. (text of link goes from clickable brown with underline to unclickable white with no underline after logging in). If you figure that out let me know and I'll update, Until then, I will use without logging into site. But I rarely login anyways.

This is an amalgamation of others work, notably:
